nodes.text: The Weequay blaster lance was an ancient model of blaster rifle used by several members of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang. Some of Hondo's men attached blades to the ends of these rifles like bayonets. HELIOS-3D, HELIOS-3E, and another IG-86 sentinel droid, all members of Cad Bane's posse, were known to use these type of rifles. The bounty hunters Cato Parasitti and Twazzi were also seen carrying these weapons.
